snippet: Fewer than half of the 100 surveyed said they thought coaches and team doctors had the players’ best interests at heart.
abstract: NFL Roundup; Associated Press survey reveals only 47 of 100 NFL players feel clubs, coaches and team doctors have their best interest at heart in matters of health and safety; other football news noted.
lead_paragraph: Fewer than half of the 100 surveyed said they thought coaches and team doctors had the players’ best interests at heart.

headline.main: Many N.F.L. Players in Survey See Conflict in Injury Care
headline.print_headline: Many Players in Survey See Conflict in Injury Care
